Package search

Interface IndexStorageBarrelInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
IndexStorageBarrel
public interface IndexStorageBarrelInterface extends Remote
The IndexStorageBarrelInterface defines a remote interface for managing an inverted index and link graph for a distributed search engine. It extends Remote to support Remote Method Invocation (RMI). Methods in this interface allow indexing words, searching for words, managing web links, checking barrel connectivity, and retrieving various indexing statistics.

  • Method Details

    • addToIndex

      void addToIndex(String word, String url) throws RemoteException, SQLException
      Adds a word to the inverted index, associating it with a URL. The URLs are stored as a semicolon-separated string in the database.
      Parameters:
      word - A palavra a ser indexada.
      url - O URL onde a palavra foi encontrada.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Caso ocorra um erro na operação remota.
      SQLException

    • searchWord

      List<String> searchWord(String word) throws RemoteException
      Performs a search in the inverted index and retrieves the URLs associated with a word. *
      Parameters:
      word - A palavra a ser pesquisada.
      Returns:
      Lista de URLs que contêm a palavra pesquisada.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Caso ocorra um erro na operação remota.

    • addLink

      void addLink(String sourceUrl, String linkedUrl) throws RemoteException
      Adds a link between two web pages in the link graph.
      Parameters:
      sourceUrl - O URL da página de origem.
      linkedUrl - O URL da página de destino.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Caso ocorra um erro na operação remota.

    • ping

      boolean ping() throws RemoteException
      Simple ping method to verify barrel connectivity.
      Returns:
      true if the barrel is active and responsive
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there's a communication error

    • isUrlIndexed

      boolean isUrlIndexed(String url) throws RemoteException
      Check if a specific URL is already indexed
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to check
      Returns:
      true if the URL is already in the index
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there's a communication error

    • getInboundLinks

      List<String> getInboundLinks(String pageUrl) throws RemoteException
      Retrieves a list of inbound links pointing to a specified page. This method queries the link graph to find all source URLs that link to the given page URL.
      Parameters:
      pageUrl - The URL for which inbound links should be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of source URLs that link to the specified page.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • getBarrelId

      String getBarrelId() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the barrel.
      Returns:
      The barrel ID as a String.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • getStats

      Map<String,Object> getStats() throws RemoteException
      Get statistics about the current state of the index
      Returns:
      A map of statistical information
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there's a communication error
